products.title: Day & Night Effortless Ivory
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Voile Cream Roller Blind
products.description: Their voile range of fabrics create a natural feature of the rooms natural light, and are fantatic at creating some privacy without sacrificing light. This cream coloured screen fabric, in its neutral colour and clean finish, creates a centre point of your window. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this cream blind is not only made by their expert team in the heart of yorkshire, but comes with customer-first service and guarantees.

products.description: Cool, clean lines of their surface fabrics would create a light, airy feel in any room. The surface cream vertical blind will bring the warmth of the colour and subtle pattern to your home. products.title: Voile Fr Sandshell Cream Roller Blind
products.description: Their voile fr fabrics look beautiful up due to their translucent properties in a wide array of neutral shades. Durable and stylish, this translucent cream roller blind allows the light to filter through and is hand-washable. This cream roller blind is ideal for kitchens as it's flame-retardant. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new voile roller blind is made by their expert team in their yorkshire workshop, and comes with customer-1st service.

products.description: Their genesis luxe blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This neutral cream linen colour roller blind is bang on trend so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blockout the light when desired. products.description: Whether pairing with minimalist monochromes or pretty pastels, this genesis blackout cream roller blind is a treat for any window. The pale cream tone is so versatile as it can appear warm alongside a traditional scheme whilst bringing a crisp and fresh feel to your space. Light and airy it may be, but this blind is also highly effective at blocking light to increase peace and privacy. products.title: Splash Smoke Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Splash smoke blue is a soft blue shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash smoke blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

products.title: Splash Pearl Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Choose pearl splash to introduce elegant creams tones into your space. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Lifetime Grain Light Grey
products.description: Lifetimegrain light grey will bring an on trend look to any room in the house. Their outstanding quality lifetime blinds are made to the same high standards as all their other venetian blinds - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by their 3 year guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fix) and a pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail.

products.title: Ecowood, Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The natural grain finish of the ecowood in porcelain grey fine grain makes it perfect for adding the look of authentic painted wood to your home. The silky grey tone is sweet and subtle, as well as completely versatile, matching a wide range of styles and colour schemes. Insert the porcelain grey fine grain into a light decor scheme for a lounge, furnishing the room with white painted wickers, luxe grey fabrics, and minimal metal.

products.title: Dapple Solar Cream Roller Blind
products.description: This range of fabrics feature an effective reflective treatment to the reverse of the fabric to reduce heat and glare keeping your room pleasant in the height of summer whilst also being effective for privacy. This cream roller blind is ideal for rooms that get a lot of sun as the solar coating will help to reflect the light away from your furnishings. products.title: Ecowood, Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Aptly named, the ecowood in chic grey fine grain is as chic as they come. A strong, sophisticated grey is featured on an authentically textured faux wood, formed into wide slats that can be easily adjusted to suit your mood and needs. Grey and yellow is fast becoming a contemporary classic, but have you ever considered going for grey and lime? This funky colour scheme will give a modern kitchen a zesty lift, whilst also maintaining a feeling of stylish chic in your home.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Oyster Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: If there's one addition to their trinity blackout range that we fell in love with the moment we set eyes on it then it's their oyster grey fabric. Stone greys are very much on-trend this season, and oyster allows you to gently work in one of the most popular shades whilst also breathing new life into your decor. We love the idea of combining oyster grey with simple natural tones and textures that allow the beauty of nature to come to the fore.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: When you think of a fabric that allows you to introduce some understated contemporary chic with a luxury vibe, it would be hard to think of anything other than trinity blackout dove. It's the beautiful finishing touch that no home should be without, so why hold back any longer?As you sit down and run your mind through the various different options, you need to think about how to match to your furniture.

products.title: Ecowood, Devon Cream Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in devon cream fine grain displays a chalky cream finish, with grain detailing, on wide faux wood slats, complete with a matching pelmet, rails, and control cords. Made from hardwearing materials, and treated for water-resistance, this is a quality blind that will last year upon year. Pair the devon cream fine grain with slate greys for a cool and modern aesthetic. Add furniture in light or painted woods and accent with a hint of pale pink or baby blue to give the look a jot of colourful character.

products.title: Ecowood, Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in penthouse fine grain offers a luxury, hushed cream tone that wouldn't look out of place in the chicest of homes. A textured surface gives the impression of a true wood grain, and this faux wood offers all the strength and durability of wood as well. Settle the penthouse fine grain amongst rich chocolate browns and muted golds for a feeling of opulent luxury in the master bedroom. Include plush rugs and silky-feel bedlinen, opting for a dark feature wall for a striking focal point.

products.title: Ecowood, Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: A regal grey, as its name suggests, the ecowood in castle grey fine grain has a beautifully textured finish and the cool grey is clean and understated. Its wide slats are easily adjustable for versatility of light, air, and privacy, making it an ideal all-rounder. Enhance a stark white wall in a living room or dining room by adding the castle grey fine grain, along with other accessories in varying shades of grey.

products.title: Splash Smoke Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash smoke blue is a chic smokey blue vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this blue vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Oyster 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Splash oyster vertical blinds provide a beautiful and elegant finish when dressing windows. The fabric is an attractive, light, natural cream colour. This fabric is also moisture resistent making them perfect for kitchens and bathrooms. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. As this is one of their made to measure products, a 5 year guarantee is also included when purchasing this blind, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Dove Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash dove grey is a chic light grey vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this grey vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.
